data.caption: Clarification sought from Studds Accessories Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Studds Accessories Ltd on November 19 2025 with reference to Movement in Volume.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Studds Accessories Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from November 07 2025 the Equity Shares of Studds Accessories Ltd (Scrip Code: 544599) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20251106- dated November 06 2025.
